history.content:
I've only taken all CS lower divs, so I can't comment on  semester 5 onwards. BUT: Your first 3 semesters are light workload while your 4th semester is very difficult. The difference between your semester 3 and 4 will be staggering.

-------

If you're planning to go to graduate school for ML, then you'll most definitely need research experience, so I highly recommend you take CS 189 earlier on, ideally before your Junior year summer.
If you're planning to go to graduate school for ML, then you'll most definitely need research experience, so I highly recommend you take CS 189 earlier on, ideally before your Junior year summer.

children.subject: As an additional add-on, if you want to go to graduate school for ML through statistics departments (which is also an option), usually they look very favorably towards analysis courses, so strongly consider Math 104/105/202A.

history.content:
Hi guys, Im trying to build up a 4 year plan that is focused on machine learning. I plan on attending graduate school after.

This coming semester will be semester 3 for me. 

Semester 1      

Math 1A

CS 61A

Semester 2

Math 1B

CW R1A

MATH 53

EE 126

Semester 6

Semester 7

CS 186

STAT 153

EE 127

Semester 8

CS 189

STAT 155

Breadth 6

Breadth 7

Is there any semester that looks like too much of a workload? Any changes you would make? Also is there any classes that seem to be missing that would be good for the machine learning pathway? Any suggestions would be appreciated! Thanks
